Jobs.title: Senior Recruiter - EMEA Recruitment Team
Jobs.description: ', '    Currently focused on the UK&I and Western European organisations, recruiting into the Consulting and Development lines of business, hiring high potential Consultants and Architects with SOA, E2.0, Cloud and IDM skills and Developers and Testers with J2EE and Solaris specialist skills.', '', 'I also drive the recruitment for our very successful MySQL, Virtualisation and Linux Sales Consulting Global Business Unit, hiring talented Enterprise Sales Execs and Managers.', '

Jobs.title: Senior Associate
Jobs.description: ', '    A founder member of IT Executive Ltd which has been operating throughout the UK and Europe since 1998 as a specialist IT & Telecoms recruitment consultancy. ', '', 'Clients varied from start-ups to large corporates but regardless of size, I created bespoke solutions to meet their individual needs. Expertise covered contingency recruitment through database search and advertised selection, along with contingency search or one off retained assignment services for higher profile hiring needs.', '

Jobs.title: Senior Consultant
Jobs.description: ', '    Contract & permanent recruitment within Telecoms Operations and Mobile/Wireless verticals.', '', 'Successfully turned around a failing contract PSL Account (Alcatel-Lucent), significantly improving both delivery within business critical programmes and the Hays profile amongst hiring managers and contractors.', '

Jobs.title: Business Development Manager
Jobs.description: ', '    Approached to join the owner in the start-up phase of the business. A 360 role as well as involvement in hiring and mentoring other Consultants.', '', 'Developed long term relationships with blue-chip and SME clients throughout the UK IT sector.', '

Jobs.title: Principal Consultant
Jobs.description: ', '    Promoted from Trainee to Principal Consultant within 12 months. Billed the highest permanent fees across the UK and European IT Divisions during 1997-1998 financial year.', '

summary: ', '    With 15 years external IT&T recruitment experience, I now work for Oracle as a Senior Recruiter across the Consulting, Sales Consulting, Development and Support lines of business, throughout Europe, Middle East & Africa. ', '', 'Why Oracle?....we provide the world’s most complete, open, and integrated business software and hardware systems, with more than 370,000 customers—including 100 of the Fortune 100—representing a variety of sizes and industries in more than 145 countries around the globe. Now, with Sun server, storage, operating-system, and virtualization technology, Oracle is the only vendor able to offer a complete technology stack in which every layer is integrated to work together as a single system.', '', "Starting more than 30 years ago with Oracle's innovative relational database, the Oracle stack today includes Oracle Enterprise Linux, Oracle VM, Oracle Fusion Middleware, and the largest and most complete set of industry and business applications software on the market. The addition of Sun storage and systems technology makes the Oracle stack complete.", '', 'Oracle employees enjoy competitive salaries, an excellent flexible benefits scheme and a network of like-minded co-workers that drive innovation across the entire technology industry. Working at Oracle means working on innovative, leading technological developments. Do you want to become part of this? Then go to: http://emeajobs.oracle.com', '', 'All direct candidate queries regarding career opportunities at Oracle are welcome. Do not hesitate to contact me directly for an informal discussion - simon.carter@oracle.com', '
